✅ create a lifetime lobbying ban for Members of Congress

1113144167805452290.text: April 2 is #EqualPayDay, which is how long into this year it takes women catch up to what men were paid in the previous year. On average, women are paid just 80 cents for every $1 paid to male counterparts.  For women of color, the #wagegap is much larger.
